channel.title: [Project Battle Realms] Looking for Team
channel.description:
Hello to everyone.
I am willing to start a project of Making a Runescape Private Server. Still haven't found a server name. Thinking of Battle Realms...Maybe. It will be a 24/7 hosted server, and we are making a Team to work on the server.
Here is what we are looking for :
[ul][li]1 Website Designer ( HTML - Flash - PHP / Bulletin Forum ) - Experience Requiered.[/li] [li]1 Experienced Coder[/li] [li]1 GFX Designer[/li][/ul]
I can code aswell, do some GFX and i know HTML aswell. But i don't want to do all the job alone. I need help to make that server the best new RSPS :)
The server name still can be changed once the team is formed and we can decide all together. [b]Skype is Requiered for all...[/b] Dropbox is required for the Coder.
Q: What kind of server i'm about to make ? A: The server will be based on a Great Player vs Monsters system, a good Skilling System, [i][b]LOW EXP[/b][/i] Rate, Making will not be super easy... just normal... Great Economy + Pk system for players that loves to Player Killing.
Q: What source are you using ? A: I don't know yet, Still looking around.
Q: Why are you wanting to make a server ? A: I'm 22 years old, tired of all those servers that are easy as hell, 2 hours of training and having all 99 skills... I'm interested to make something that will take weeks to get all 99 skills... And almost all the servers dies after 2-3 weeks... so here is why i want to start my own 24/7 Server, staying online for over 1-2 years... maybe more if everything works fine.
Here is my Skype if you are interested. DON'T ADD ME if you have no experience and have no clue of what you are doing : Owner.Webster

item.title: [Project Battle Realms] Looking for Team
item.dc:creator: @shaun123430 shaun123430
item.description:
@shaun123430 wrote:

Looks cool I will probably play your server, although I can’t help out with coding or anything because I have no experience with that.

Read full topic

item.title: [Project Battle Realms] Looking for Team
item.dc:creator: @Webster90 Webster90
item.description:
@Webster90 wrote:

Hello to everyone.

I am willing to start a project of Making a Runescape Private Server. Still haven’t found a server name. Thinking of Battle Realms…Maybe.
It will be a 24/7 hosted server, and we are making a Team to work on the server.

Here is what we are looking for :

[ul][li]1 Website Designer ( HTML - Flash - PHP / Bulletin Forum ) - Experience Requiered.[/li]
[li]1 Experienced Coder[/li]
[li]1 GFX Designer[/li][/ul]

I can code aswell, do some GFX and i know HTML aswell. But i don’t want to do all the job alone. I need help to make that server the best new RSPS

The server name still can be changed once the team is formed and we can decide all together.
Skype is Requiered for all…
Dropbox is required for the Coder.

Q: What kind of server i’m about to make ?
A: The server will be based on a Great Player vs Monsters system, a good Skilling System, LOW EXP Rate, Making will not be super easy… just normal… Great Economy + Pk system for players that loves to Player Killing.

Q: What source are you using ?
A: I don’t know yet, Still looking around.

Q: Why are you wanting to make a server ?
A: I’m 22 years old, tired of all those servers that are easy as hell, 2 hours of training and having all 99 skills… I’m interested to make something that will take weeks to get all 99 skills… And almost all the servers dies after 2-3 weeks… so here is why i want to start my own 24/7 Server, staying online for over 1-2 years… maybe more if everything works fine.

Here is my Skype if you are interested. DON’T ADD ME if you have no experience and have no clue of what you are doing :
Owner.Webster
